title: CLG vs ROX *spoilers*
body: CLG won. Worlds is officially a clown fiesta.

replies.body: Tsm loses to rng -  tsm beats ssg- rng looses to ssg = ???

rock - paper - scissors

But really, the better team generally just has a higher probability of winning.  It's still possible for the other team to win (up to a point).
tsm just got heavily outcomped. They shouldnt have picked an immobile adc.
I wish teams would quit being so arrogant and ignoring obvious mistakes. Example: don't give Huhi A. Sol for free.
why not? out of the 3 times he played {{champion:136}} he lost 2 times and this was his first win in a team.
Have you seen him on champs that are not Sol? He looks like Perkz on anything else.

> [{quoted}](name=LegendmakerGX,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=xlEzx99E,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-03T04:07:16.505+0000)
>
> why not? out of the 3 times he played {{champion:136}} he lost 2 times and this was his friend win in a team.

It was a horrible non-ban. Not quite to the level of Impact-Gnar or Mata-Alistair. But close.
